_header: I you rede ye sitten still
_description: Wise admonitions: Biblical texts paraphrased, intermingled with similar texts in Latin

CamTCC323.First Lines:
Yc ou rede ye sitten stille& herknet wel wid gode
                    wille…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…his soule scalinto heuene wendeant wonie þer wid outen
                    ende
CamTCC323.Editions:
Brunner,  Karl. 
             “Zwei Gedichte aus der Handschrift Trinity College Cambridge
                323.” 
             Englische Studien
         70 (1935): 221-43: 225-30.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             “An Early Mention of a St. Nicholas Play in England.” 
             Studies in Philology
         28 (1931): 594-601: 594-601.
